Is that so!\""},{"lineNumber":205118,"originalJapaneseLine":"「嬉しい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm happy!\""},{"lineNumber":205119,"originalJapaneseLine":"　オレはとても嬉しいぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm really happy!\""},{"lineNumber":205120,"originalJapaneseLine":"「必ず幸せにしてやる！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I will definitely make you conversation,"},{"lineNumber":205124,"originalJapaneseLine":"元就と結婚することになった。","translatedEnglishLine":"You decided to marry Mototsune."},{"lineNumber":205125,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、なんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, what’s this?"},{"lineNumber":205126,"originalJapaneseLine":"　即決即断の大将らしくもない」","translatedEnglishLine":"Not like a decisive general at all.\""},{"lineNumber":205127,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあいいだろう！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, that’s fine!"},{"lineNumber":205128,"originalJapaneseLine":"　焦ってでかいサカナを取り逃すのは","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a shame to rush and miss the big catch,"},{"lineNumber":205129,"originalJapaneseLine":"　惜しいからな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"so I won’t do anytime!"},{"lineNumber":205131,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それは盛大な式を挙げてやる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will hold a grand ceremony for you!\""},{"lineNumber":205132,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐわっははははははははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guwa ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!\" (boisterous laughter)"},{"lineNumber":205133,"originalJapaneseLine":"元就はさして気にした様子もなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"Mototsune didn’t seem to mind much,"},{"lineNumber":205134,"originalJapaneseLine":"豪快に笑っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and laughed heartily."},{"lineNumber":205135,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that so!\""},{"lineNumber":205136,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあいい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, fine!\""},{"lineNumber":205137,"originalJapaneseLine":"「オレは諦めんぞ！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I will never give up!!!!\""},{"lineNumber":205138,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐわっははははははははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guwa ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!\" (boisterous laughter)"},{"lineNumber":205139,"originalJapaneseLine":"元就は諦める気はないらしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems Mototsune has no intention to give up."},{"lineNumber":205140,"originalJapaneseLine":"豪快に笑っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"He was laughing heartily."},{"lineNumber":205141,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……と、言ってみたが。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...That's what I said, but."},{"lineNumber":205142,"originalJapaneseLine":"　クカカカ","translatedEnglishLine":"Kukakaka (chuckle)\""},{"lineNumber":205143,"originalJapaneseLine":"突然、元就は落ち着いた様子で息を吐き出した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Suddenly, Mototsune exhaled calmly."},{"lineNumber":205144,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まずは明日の決戦が先だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"First, tomorrow's decisive battle comes first.\""},{"lineNumber":205145,"originalJapaneseLine":"「互いに死ぬかも知れんからな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because we both might die."},{"lineNumber":205146,"originalJapaneseLine":"　カカカカ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Kakakaka (laugh)\""},{"lineNumber":205147,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":205148,"originalJapaneseLine":"ジッと……","translatedEnglishLine":"Staring intently..."},{"lineNumber":205149,"originalJapaneseLine":"いつだって敵意に溢れている元就の瞳が","translatedEnglishLine":"Eyes of Mototsune, usually overflowing with hostility,"},{"lineNumber":205150,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたの顔を見つめていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"were fixed on your face."},{"lineNumber":205151,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大将、死ぬなよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"General, don't die.\""},{"lineNumber":205152,"originalJapaneseLine":"「オレとて毛利の男。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even I am a man of Mōri."},{"lineNumber":205153,"originalJapaneseLine":"　近しい者の死はいつだって覚悟しているが、","translatedEnglishLine":"I am always prepared for the death of those close to me,"},{"lineNumber":205154,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それでもやはり、堪える」","translatedEnglishLine":"but even so, it still hurts.\""},{"lineNumber":205155,"originalJapaneseLine":"「オレはお前が死ぬと嫌だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't want you to die.\""},{"lineNumber":205156,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すごく嫌だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I really don't want that.\""},{"lineNumber":205157,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もしかしたら泣くかも知れん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I might even cry."},{"lineNumber":205158,"originalJapaneseLine":"　泣くのは格好悪いから嫌だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"But crying is uncool, so I hate it.\""},{"lineNumber":205159,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから死ぬな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So don't die.\""},{"lineNumber":205160,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Got it?\""},{"lineNumber":205161,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 陶器も連れてきていいぞ」「で。
あなたは唐突に求婚の返事を求められた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were suddenly asked to give your reply to a marriage proposal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オレはとても嬉しいぞ！」
元就は非常に嬉しそうに笑っていた。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the course of the conversation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元就と結婚することになった。
即決即断の大将らしくもない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not like a decisive general at all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 焦ってでかいサカナを取り逃すのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a shame to rush and miss the big catch,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「オレと結婚したくなったらいつでも言え！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you ever want to marry me, just say so anytime!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは盛大な式を挙げてやる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will hold a grand ceremony for you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐわっははははははははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guwa ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!" (boisterous laughter)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元就はさして気にした様子もなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mototsune didn’t seem to mind much,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐわっははははははははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guwa ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!" (boisterous laughter)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元就は諦める気はないらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems Mototsune has no intention to give up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突然、元就は落ち着いた様子で息を吐き出した。
「まずは明日の決戦が先だな」
「互いに死ぬかも知れんからな。
いつだって敵意に溢れている元就の瞳が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eyes of Mototsune, usually overflowing with hostility,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたの顔を見つめていた。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even I am a man of Mōri.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近しい者の死はいつだって覚悟しているが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am always prepared for the death of those close to me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでもやはり、堪える」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but even so, it still hurts."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もしかしたら泣くかも知れん。
泣くのは格好悪いから嫌だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But crying is uncool, so I hate it."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
